name: leg-extension
title: Straight Leg Extension
description: Starting with your feet on the floor, slowly extend your leg out.

name: elbow-horizontal
title: Rotator Cuff External Rotation
description: Bend your arm horizontally, then slowly rotate your arm up in an arch.

name: elbow-extension
title: Elbow Extension
description: Lie down, bend your arm at a 90 degree angle, and rotate your arm in an arch.

name: placeholder
title: Lying Hip Abduction
description: Lie down, bend your arm at a 90 degree angle, and rotate your arm in an arch.
